about_the_game:
Scarlet Rain is an innovative third-person shooter for Windows PC. Playing as a vengeful vigilante who comes back to the city of his childhood, players will have to navigate through the dark and dirty rain soaked alleys of Istanbul while unraveling a conspiracy that goes back generations.
The game revolves around unique physics interactions, behavior based random AI encounters, dynamic environments and objectives.

Game features:

- Hands-on interaction & combat: Reach out with your hand to touch, pick up and use objects.

- A unique set of interaction and combat actions, all are physics-based and handled by you.

- Game environment features dynamic, randomly assigned situations. Every playthrough may yield different outcomes.

- Dark and deep story of revenge against insurmountable odds, in a brutal urban jungle.

- A unique gaming experience: There are no mid-level saves and the levels change slightly every time you play, so every excursion out into the night brings with it its own rewards and challenges. Each excursion is its own self contained adventure.

- Photo digitized models and textures, all hand crafted, and original soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of violence (fighting, stabbing and shooting). Contains minimal visual depiction of bloody wounds.

short_description: Enter the dark, gritty world of Scarlet Rain. Become the lone vigilante, out to right twenty years worth of injustice in this single-player third person action/adventure experience, featuring unique physics based gameplay & combat elements, and an unpredictable game world.
